title: Ticket #6146: Set STARTD_NOCLAIM_SHUTDOWN from annex command-line
description: The thinking is that a lot of people will want to adjust how long an annex instance waits for work before giving up.
remarks:
2017-Feb-15 18:09:19 by tlmiller:
Add the new flag to the wiki documentation once the pre-release is done building and the binary linked to from the instructions updated. (Since this is experimental code yet, we're not doing documentation in the manual proper yet.)

2017-Feb-15 18:16:56 by tlmiller:
Also, since this commit included the default setting for the lease, explicitly mention that only -annex-name and -count (or -slots) are required (and that -lease-duration defaults to 50 minutes, and that -instance-type is optional).
check_ins: 2017-Feb-15 15:13   Check-in [50164]: (#6146) Allow annex user to set STARTD_NOCLAIM_SHUTDOWN from the command line. Add a 50-minute default for the lease. Also, add the default AWS URLs to the param table. (By Todd L Miller )
creator: tlmiller
